entries.content: Challenge the customer to unearth their real pain points and business challenges.
Make the customer think differently; if you don't, why would they give you money or time?
If you don't behave differently, you'll be judged only on price and likability. Act differently to avoid this.
If you don't make them think differently, why would they give you a load of money or time?

focus_area: Handling Price Objections: Reframe to ROI, "Compared to what?", breakdown strategy
